amendment.description: To increase the amount of fencing and improve vehicle barriers installed along the southwest border of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3979 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 16. Record Vote Number: 126.

action.text: Amendment SA 3979 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S4651-4665, S4675; text: CR S4651-4652) To increase the amount of fencing and improve vehicle barriers installed along the southwest border of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3979 proposed by Senator Sessions.
